sentence: Yet we see time and time again this  body vote, under Republican leadership, for another ocean of red ink,  another massive deficit, adding to an already bloated debt that so  profoundly compromises the ability of our Nation to address issues in  the next generation.
Republican leadership today had a chance to authorize year-round E15,  a commonsense blend of ethanol and gasoline, but guess what.
In fact, I heard that Republican leadership told my fellow New York  Republicans that they needed to find a way to pay for the ACA subsidy  extension if they wanted to even have a vote on it.
Now, Republican leadership, who love to extend tax breaks for  billionaires, are making things worse by, for months, refusing to  extend the Affordable Care Act's tax credits for regular people.
Now, I am sure the President will  have in his mind that he should target for retribution these 17  Republicans for defying him, for defying the orthodoxy of the  Republican leadership.

This is Donald Trump  bullying Senate Republicans to get a bill passed no matter what is  actually in it, and this is Republican leadership perhaps daring their  own members who are deeply worried about this bill to oppose it on the  floor.
It is a failure of President Trump's leadership and House  Republican leadership.
But Republican leadership in Congress has been clear: they want to  give the corporate lobbyists everything they ask for and then some.
If House Republican leadership wants to go it alone on Federal  funding to keep our government open, well, that is their prerogative.
The bottom line is that that has  nothing to do with the Republican leadership.
Unfortunately, it was never taken up by the Republican leadership in  the House of Representatives.

Speaker, Republican leadership is twisting themselves into knots  trying to look like they are doing something on Epstein to give their  Members something to vote on, anything for political cover, while also  not upsetting the President.
We need a negotiation, but this SNAP doesn't  have to happen in any case and only because Donald Trump is doing it,  and the Republican leadership goes along with Donald Trump to let SNAP  expire.
I have no  doubt that if Republican leadership just puts the resolution on the  floor, it will pass unanimously in this House.

Speaker, I recognize Representatives Houchin and Russell Fry, as  well as our Republican leadership and the Appropriations Committee led  by Chairman Cole, for their leadership on these critical pieces of  legislation being considered.
We need to look at the results that this President,  President Trump, and where the House Republican leadership has taken  this country over the last year.
All of those types of  things are happening under Republican leadership.
Let's be clear: Senate Democratic leadership knew about the language,  as well as Senate Republican leadership.
Speaker, America is not a surveillance state, and under  Republican leadership, it never will be.

Speaker, in any event, when the next reconciliation package comes  through, I strongly hope that the Republican leadership, rather than  allowing something like the low-income housing tax credit to go through  and be expanded, of all things, Republican leadership recognizes this  is a problem.
Republican leadership was also crucial in prioritizing this bill for  the floor and helping us navigate the floor process.
Waters and Republican leadership to research this, talk about  it, think about it, and have hearings about it for over 5 years now.
We are lifting up  the middle class, restoring fairness, and proving once again that,  under Republican leadership, the American Dream is alive and well.
America is now reaching  new milestones under Republican leadership, turning the tide back to  American greatness.
